name: Lost In Dreams
description:
Just a normal tiring day, go to work, eat and go to bed. But the only unpredictable thing in your day is... your DREAMS

Note: this game is weird and badly designed

Controls:

A,W,S,D or Up,Down,Left,Right keys to move

Mouse to look around

Touch objects to interact(not possible with objects not made to interact)

Alt + F4 to quit

Download Instructions:

Download the file unzip it and run "Lost_In_Dreams.exe"
